snippet: On May 2, 1863, Confederate Gen. Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson was accidentally wounded by his own men at the Battle of Chancellorsville in Virginia.
abstract: On May 2, 1863, Confederate Gen. Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson was accidentally wounded by his own men at the Battle of Chancellorsville in Virginia.

headline.main: May 2, 1863 | Stonewall Jackson Shot by His Own Men at Chancellorsville
